content.rendered: PyrAmes was selected by MedTech Innovator to participate in the 50 Best-in-Class Startups for 2019 Showcase and Accelerator from over 800 applicants.  The companies are part of an elite group of MedTech developers and will be featured at the Wilson Sonsini Goodrich & Rosati’s 27th Annual Medical Device Conference in San Francisco on June 21 and The MedTech Conference in Boston September 23-25.

excerpt.rendered:

Read More…
